general.address_extended: Piazzale Caiazzo, 2 Milano, 20124, Italia Vicino a fermata metro verde M2 Caiazzo

hero.title: Consult a doctor in just a few steps
hero.description: With infinitydoc you have the possibility to talk to a local doctor wherever you are whenever you are .

services.title: Our services tailored on your needs
services.description: Infinitydoc is the innovative medical consultancy service that allows you to access a doctor instantly 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. If you prefer, you can also show up at the clinic or request a home visit with the same availability.

list.title: Tele-consulting
list.description: Available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Immediate phone call with one of our medical professionals.

list.title: Video-consulting
list.description: Available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Immediate video call with one of our professional doctors.

list.title: Clinic Appointment
list.description: Book a visit at our clinic in the city center of Milan. You can book within 1 h notice.

list.title: Home visitconsultation
list.description: We reach you wherever you are throughout Milan and its province.*

how_it_works.title: In just a few clicks you are in contact with a local doctor
how_it_works.description: We have rethought the process of booking a medical visit to make it simpler and faster. With Infinitydoc you can book a medical visit in just a few clicks, without having to wait in line or go to the clinic.

steps.title: Select the type of visit
steps.description: Choose between a tele-consultation, video-consultation, clinic visit or a home visit.

steps.title: Select the date and time
steps.description: Choose the date and time you prefer for your medical visit.

steps.title: All Done! Your doctor is waiting for you !
steps.description: Your doctor will contact you at the scheduled time for your medical consultation.

plans.title: Choose the subscription that's right for you
plans.description: With the Infinitydoc subscrition you can access levels of services tailored for you. Benefit from all our services at a fixed monthly price!

content.title: Standard
features: 1 home visits at a discounted cost
1 specialist consultation bookings at a discounted cost (Up to 15% off)

content.title: Premium
content.intro: For your total ease of mind
features: 2 home visits at a discounted cost
3 specialist consultation bookings at a discounted cost (Up to 15% off)

content.title: Family
features: 3 home visits at a discounted cost
5 specialist consultation bookings at a discounted cost (Up to 15% off)

cures.title: Invest now in your future’s wellbeing
cures.description: With Infinitydoc you have the possibility to get immediate remedies at the right time. Whatever happens we are able to give you initial guidance to obtain the best results in the shortest possible time. Here is a list of the most frequently resolved conditions with our consultations.

list: Laboratory order for sexually transmitted diseases

mission.title: Making medical care more accessible and affordable
mission.description: We want to raise the quality level of medical care in Milan and make access to health services simpler and more convenient.

questions.title: How does online booking work?
questions.answer: Choose the service you want, select the day and time you prefer and proceed with payment. Once payment is completed you will receive a confirmation email.

questions.title: Methods of payment
questions.answer: We accept payments by credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay and bank transfer.

questions.title: Can I cancel the booking?
questions.answer: You can cancel your reservation up to 12 hours before your appointment. To cancel your reservation, contact us by email or telephone.

questions.title: How to get in touch
questions.description: You can contact us by email at: info@infinitydoc.it or by telephone at +39 3888770022.

contacts.title: Come visit us!
contacts.description: We look forward to welcoming you to our medical practice. Infinitydoc is located in Piazzale Caiazzo 2, a few steps from the M2 Caiazzo green metro stop.

footer.description: InfinityDoc is constantly looking to improve its service to ensure the best possible experience for its patients.
contacts: Piazzale Caiazzo, 2 Milano, 20124, Italia Near Green Underground M2 stop 'Caiazzo'
